title: geth appear timed out DAO fork-check
body:
**#### System information**
Geth version: 
Geth
Version: 1.4.13-stable-8f0db697
Protocol Versions: [63 62]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.5.1
OS: linux
GOPATH=/opt/ethfans/go
GOROOT=/usr/lib/golang
OS & Version: CentOS 6.6
#### Expected behaviour

When I geth sync node occure a lot time out, how can i repair it , Everyone can suggest ? Thank you 
This log is:

## 

i try to repair it 
command:
1. Backup your wallet.
2. Download the latest Geth
3. Make sure your time is synced to a time service of your choosing.
4. ./geth removedb
5. ./geth --fast --maxpeers 99 --cache 1024 --jitvm

eg: [https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/issues/2857]

But still fail  : (

update to geth version 1.4.16-stable, It working

```
$ geth version
Geth
Version: 1.4.16-stable
Protocol Versions: [63 62]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.5.1
OS: linux
GOPATH=/opt/ethfans/go
GOROOT=/usr/lib/golang
```
